what: Get normal densities, shifted and scaled — get_norm_density
title: Get normal densities, shifted and scaled — get_norm_density
Get normal densities, shifted and scaled — get_norm_density
code: get_norm_density(   outcome_mean = 0,   error_sigma = 1,   dens_spread_factor = 1,   predictor_value = 0,   z = 2 )

title: Get normal densities, shifted and scaled — get_norm_density
text: outcome_mean mean value normal distribution error_sigma spead (sd) normal distribution dens_spread_factor spread factor densities predictor_value offset added densities z z-value indicating start end z-values densities

title: Get normal densities, shifted and scaled — get_norm_density
code: lm1 <- lm(mpg ~ hp, data = mtcars) lm1_pred_200 <- predict(lm1, newdata = tibble(hp = 200)) #> Error in tibble(hp = 200): could not find function "tibble"  ggplot(mtcars) +   aes(x = hp, y = mpg) +   geom_point() +   geom_abline(slope = coef(lm1)[2], intercept = coef(lm1)[1], color = "blue") +   geom_path(     data = get_norm_density(       outcome_mean = lm1_pred_200,       error_sigma = 2,       z = 3,       dens_spread_factor = 5e1,       predictor_value = 200     ),     aes(y = outcome, x = norm_dens)   ) #> Error in ggplot(mtcars): could not find function "ggplot"

title: Hello, World! — hello
code: hello() #> Error in hello(): could not find function "hello"

title: Plot shaded normal — shaded_normal
text: plots standard normal distribution, lower/upper part (2.5%, 97.5% per default) filled color

title: Plot shaded normal — shaded_normal
code: shaded_normal(   xmin = -3,   xmax = 3,   threshold_min = -1.96,   threshold_max = 1.96,   color1 = "#E69F00",   color2 = "#56B4E9",   alpha_value = 0.9,   breaks = c(threshold_min, threshold_max) )

title: Plot shaded normal — shaded_normal
text: xmin min value plotted normal (dbl) xmax max value plotted normal (dbl) threshold_min lower threshold (default -1.96) threshold_max upper threshold (default 1.96) color1 fill color central part distribution (#E69F00) color2 fill color extremal part distribution (#56B4E9) alpha_value alpha fill (default .9)

title: Plot shaded normal — shaded_normal
code: shaded_normal() + labs(x = "", y = "") #> Error in ggplot(NULL, aes(c(xmin, xmax))): could not find function "ggplot" shaded_normal(breaks = -3:3) + labs(x = "", y = "") #> Error in ggplot(NULL, aes(c(xmin, xmax))): could not find function "ggplot" shaded_normal(breaks = -3:3) +   theme(panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(),   panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank()) #> Error in ggplot(NULL, aes(c(xmin, xmax))): could not find function "ggplot"
